sentences.en: He has the ability sidestep opponents and to make prodigious leaps, blocking shots and grabbing rebounds.
sentences.cn: 他擅长躲避对手,在封阻对方的投篮或拼抢篮板球时做出惊人的跳跃动作.

sentences.en: He was trying to sidestep responsibility.

sentences.en: I don't think there's any way in the world you can sidestep all hell.
sentences.cn: 我想人生在世是不能躲过所有灾难的.

sentences.en: One might sidestep the question and simply accept the gas - dust complexes as something actually observed.

sentences.en: Rarely, if ever, does he sidestep a question.
